title: The Ghost of You
description: Broken hearts are better left broken.That has been my motto for the last seven years.I keep everyone out. Even the music that beats through me.Until I meet Noah Taylor.He cracks the ice.Brings music back to my life.He makes me believe my dreams are within my grasp.But the ghosts of my past refuse to stay put.And they might put out the fire inside of me forever.
author: Tori Fox
